ing: 1 (6 ounce) package fruit flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "It's Jello with a kick. Vodka is mixed with any fruit flavored gelatin and drunk in a shot glass."
ins: In a large bowl, mix boiling water with gelatin. Stir until gelatin dissolves. Stir in vodka and cold water. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill in refrigerator for 1 hour, or until set.
